PERSONA.NAME: King Richard the Second
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son of Edward the Black Prince and grandson to Edward III. Murdered after Bullingbrook's coronation as Henry IV.

PERSONA.NAME: John of Gaunt
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of Lancaster, uncle to the King.

PERSONA.NAME: Edmund of Langley, Duke of York
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of York, uncle to the King, father to Duke of Aumerle

PERSONA.NAME: Henry Bullingbrook, King Henry IV
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of Herford, son to John of Gaunt, afterwards King Henry IV.

PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called Duke of Norfolk, banished by Richard II and later dies in exile in Italy.

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Surrey
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A loyalist to Richard II.

PERSONA.NAME: Earl of Salisbury
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A loyalist to Richard II.
